question: In which year was the historic center of Ã‰vora, Portugal, declared a UNESCO World Heritage site?
asked_question_translated: Kuriais metais Evoros (Portugalija) istorinis centras buvo paskelbtas UNESCO pasaulio paveldo objektu?
answer: Evora istorinis centras buvo paskelbtas UNESCO pasaulio paveldo objektu 1986 metais.
answer_translated_eng: The historic centre of Evora was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1986.
